# Retrieve Dataset


```{r retrieve_online_retail_data, echo=TRUE}
curl_download(
  "https://archive.ics.uci.edu/ml/machine-learning-databases/00502/online_retail_II.xlsx",
  destfile = "data/online_retail_II.xlsx",
  quiet    = FALSE,
  mode     = "wb"
  )
```



# Perform Basic Data Preparation


```{r load_retail_data, echo=TRUE}
data_tbl <- read_excel("data/online_retail_II.xlsx")

data_tbl %>% glimpse()
```
